Natalie desperately wanted to go inside and play with Mike but she didn't want to hurt the feelings of the girl that completely worshiped her.

Natalie politely said no to Jenny and offered another time to hang out. Jenny gratefully accepted and went back to her house that was less than a block away. Natalie, satisfied with her ability to talk her way out of anything, ran upstairs as fast as possible. She stomped as hard as she could on the way up making it even harder for Mike to breathe. You walk into the classroom with an open mind for the day, not knowing what was on today's agenda. He knew that the unit was anatomy, but the exact lesson was unknown to him. Whatever the lesson may be, he knew that he could at least look forward to the person directing class, Ms. Greene. Ms Greene was what you would call a milf. She was in her early forties, but her body was still kicking. Her brown hair which came down to her DD tits only complemented her juicy, bouncing ass which she displayed prominently in yoga pants pretty much every day. Every boy in the high school dreamed of fucking her after school one day.

The light blinds you as the small light which was once just the light in the ceiling is now the sun to you, as you sit up and freak out at your predicament.
